name: Lamb's Club Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Bruce Reynolds, New York.

name: Lasky Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Last Round Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: This cocktail won First Prize at the Ladies' Cocktail Contest at the Hotel Claridge, by Mdlle. Dondjaui.

name: Lawhill Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Leave-it-to-me Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: Left Bank Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe by Sam Hellman, Great Neck, Long Island.

name: Legion Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain. Squeeze orange peel on top.
note: Recipe from Luigi, Elmano's Bar, Paris.

name: Lemon Squash
instruction: In a large tumbler, mix lemon juice and sugar. Add cracked ice and fill with soda water. Stir well.

name: Leroi Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.

name: "L.G." Cocktail
instruction: Serve whisky with beer as a chaser.
note: Favourite drink in Scotland with Labour M.P.s.

name: Little Devil Cocktail
instruction: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass.
note: Recipe from Fitz, Giro's Bar, London.

name: Locomotive
instruction: Shake well and strain into a medium-sized wine glass.

name: Lone Tree Cocktail
instruction: Squeeze orange peel in the shaker, shake well, and strain into a cocktail glass with a cherry.
note: Named after the island on which stands New York City.
